quote: Life is magic.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: Magic's just science that we don't understand yet.
author: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: There is no magic. There is only knowledge, more or less hidden.
author: Gene Wolfe,  Shadow & Claw

quote: Science, you don't know, looks like magic.
author: Christopher Moore

quote: If you want to see magic, love someone and see the magical transformation.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Only from the soul can you see the magic.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: What he did to my heart was sheer, inexplicable, magic.
author: Wendelin Van Draanen,  Flipped

quote: There is no such things as magic, though there is such a thing as knowledge of the hidden ways of Nature.
author: H. Rider Haggard,  She

quote: Love and magic have a great deal in common. They enrich the soul, delight the heart. And they both take practice.
author: Nora Roberts

quote: Books may well be the only true magic.
author: Alice Hoffman

quote: Magic's an art where you use slight of hand or illusion to create wonder. And I was just intrigued with that idea.
author: David Blaine

quote: Imagination is the true magic carpet.
author: Norman Vincent Peale,  Norman Vincent Peale: Three Complete Books: The Power of Positive Thinking; The Positive Principle Today; Enthusiasm Makes the Difference

quote: Love is a magical power. If love is not a living magic, then what is?
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Extraordinary magic is woven through ordinary life. Look around!
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: The power of love can spread magic to the world like nothing else.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Magic is a science.Miracle is the work.Mind is a laboratory.
author: Toba Beta,  My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: Magic exists. Who can doubt it, when there are rainbows and wildflowers, the music of the wind and the silence of the stars? Anyone who has loved has been touched by magic. It is such a simple and such an extraordinary part of the lives we live.
author: Nora Roberts

quote: You think that it’s not magic that keeps you alive? Just ‘cause you understand the mechanics of how something works, doesn’t make it any less of a miracle. Which is just another word for magic. We’re all kept alive by magic, Sookie. My magic’s just a little different from yours, that’s all.
author: Charlaine Harris

quote: Life is magical for a lover.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Witchcraft to the ignorant, .... Simple science to the learned.
author: Leigh Brackett

quote: I hope people remember me as a guy who brought magic to the people. You know, pushed the boundaries of wonder.
author: David Blaine

quote: Love can sometimes be magic. But magic can sometimes... just be an illusion.
author: Javan

quote: But dear, don’t be afraid of love it’s only magic.
author: Robert M. Drake

quote: Why do we think love is a magician? Because the whole power of magic consists in love. The work of magic is the attraction of one thing by another because of a certain affinity of nature.
author: Marsilio Ficino

quote: Of course there must be lots of Magic in the world,"he said wisely one day, "but people don't know what it is like or how to make it. Perhaps the beginning is just to say nice things are going to happen until you make them happen. I am going to try and experiment.
author: Frances Hodgson Burnett,  The Secret Garden

quote: Spell is a structured words that creates miracles in mind.
author: Toba Beta,  My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: I don't believe in the kind of magic in my books. But I do believe something very magical can happen when you read a good book.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: The magic is only in what books say, how they stitched the patches of the universe together into one garment for us.
author: Ray Bradbury,  Fahrenheit 451

quote: Believe in the wonderment of life, the magic of love, and the reality of death.
author: Carroll Bryant

quote: I am a great admirer of mystery and magic. Look at this life - all mystery and magic.
author: Harry Houdini

quote: Manipulation, fueled with good intent, can be a blessing. But when used wickedly, it is the beginning of a magician's karmic calamity.
author: T.F. Hodge,  From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: MagicSandra’s seen a leprechaun,Eddie touched a troll,Laurie danced with witches once,Charlie found some goblins gold.Donald heard a mermaid sing,Susy spied an elf,But all the magic I have knownI've had to make myself.
author: Shel Silverstein,  Where the Sidewalk Ends: The Poems and Drawings of Shel Silverstein

quote: We do not need magic to transform our world. We carry all the power we need inside ourselves already.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: To enjoy the magic of life, smile with love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We do not need magic to transform our world. We carry all of the power we need inside ourselves already.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Love is another kind of power, which shouldn't surprise you. Magic comes from emotions, among other things. And when two people are together, in that intimacy, when they really, selflessly love each other it changes them both. It lingers on in the energy of their lives, even when they are apart.
author: Jim Butcher,  Blood Rites

quote: Often the magical elements in my books are standing in for elements of the real world, the small and magical-in-their-own-right sorts of things that we take for granted and no longer pay attention to, like the bonds of friendship that entwine our own lives with those of other people and places.
author: Charles de Lint

quote: The first magic of love is our ignorance that it can ever end.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Those who don't believe in magic will never find it.
author: Roald Dahl

quote: Life is a magical melody.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Books are a uniquely portable magic.
author: Stephen King,  On Writing: A Memoir of the Craft

quote: Disbelief in magic can force a poor soul into believing in government and business.
author: Tom Robbins

quote: Las Vegas Magic! I was the greatest magician in the world.Things were going great. My agent booked me to play the Mirage Hotel in Las Vegas for $100,000 per performance!When I got onstage everything suddenly disappeared.I'm not sure if it was allan illusion or a delusion,but I cashed the check anyway just to be safe.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: The world is full of magical things patiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Art resides in the quality of doing, process is not magic.
author: Charles Eames

quote: There is something about words. In expert hands, manipulated deftly, they take you prisoner. Wind themselves around your limbs like spider silk, and when you are so enthralled you cannot move, they pierce your skin, enter your blood, numb your thoughts. Inside you they work their magic.
author: Diane Setterfield,  The Thirteenth Tale

quote: For me, there is very little difference between magic and art. To me, the ultimate act of magic is to create something from nothing: It's like when the stage magician pulls the rabbit from the hat.
author: Alan Moore

quote: If you want to call it that. But it is a very specific sort of magic. There's a magic you take from death. Something leaves the world, something else comes into it.
author: Neil Gaiman,  The Graveyard Book

quote: She's mad, but she's magic. There's no lie in her fire.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: Love is the magic, mystery, and the beauty of life.
author: Debasish Mridha
